code: import React from"react";import IMGmyphoto from"../assets/imgs/me.jpg";import MailIcon from"../assets/imgs/mail-icon.png";import LinkedinIcon from"../assets/imgs/linkedin-icon.png";import WppIcon from"../assets/imgs/wpp-icon.png";import"../About/MediaQueries.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AboutMe=()=>{const redirectToEmail=()=>{window.location.href='mailto:heloisacativo@gmail.com';};const redirectToLinkedin=()=>{window.open('https://www.linkedin.com/in/helenacativo/','_blank');};const redirectToWhatsapp=()=>{const phoneNumber='5592984788147';const whatsappLink="https://wa.me/".concat(phoneNumber);window.open(whatsappLink,'_blank');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"aboutContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:IMGmyphoto,alt:"Minha foto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sou Heloisa, estudante de Engenharia de Software, gosto de Design UX e Programa\xE7\xE3o Front-End."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contactContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:MailIcon,alt:"Email Icon",onClick:redirectToEmail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LinkedinIcon,alt:"Linkedin Icon",onClick:redirectToLinkedin}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:WppIcon,alt:"Wpp Icon",onClick:redirectToWhatsapp})]})]});};export default AboutMe;
